page.title: 13RACIAL AWARENESS IN SWINDON
page.content:
{Swindon}has a range of ethnic minorities including West Indian and Asian. They constitute only 4 percent of the total population of the town, 140 000. We conducted a survey of people's attitudes in Swindon shopping centre. We interviewed 30 people, both black and white.
Question 1: Do you mix with people of a different race? {Answer: YES: 26; NO: 2; DON'T KNOW: 2 Question 2: Do people of a different race live in your community? {Answer: YES: 24; NO: 6. Question 3: Do you think black and white people should be separated? {Answer: YES: 0; NO: 28; DON'T KNOW: 2 Question 4: Do you believe in mixed marraiages? {Answer: YES: 16; NO: 7; DON'T KNOW: 7.
